title: Who sang the hip-hop song “The Rain (Supa Dupa Fly)”? - Quora

response.answer_text: The Rain (Supa Dupa Fly is a 1997 hit song recorded by American rapper Missy Misdemeanor Elliott. It was written and composed by Don Bryant, Bernard "Bernie" Miller, Elliott, and producer Timbaland for her debut album Supa Dupa Fly (1997).
